text: I live in a country where Christmas starts as soon as the -ber months hit. So we don’t find it weird when brands start teasing as early as now what they are coming up with for the holiday season. If you’re into advent calendars, you have around a hundred days or so to go before they actually start, so it’s good to start looking for one now. And if you’re into sweet things, then this one from a beloved French preserves brand may be one you need to add to your cart soon. Bonne Maman has returned with its ninth annual advent calendar, and the 2025 edition brings a stunning visual transformation that’s already creating buzz among holiday enthusiasts. This year’s Limited Edition Bonne Maman Advent Calendar features a completely reimagined design: a beautifully illustrated Christmas tree scene that captures the magic of the holiday season in vintage-inspired artistry. Brand: Bonne Maman The calendar for this year features warm, nostalgic holiday artwork, which depicts a charming winter wonderland complete with snow-covered trees and festive details. The vintage-inspired design shows a nostalgic holiday scene that transforms the packaging into a decorative piece worthy of display throughout the season. Unlike previous years’ designs, this Christmas tree motif creates a more cohesive and enchanting visual story that appeals to both gift-givers and recipients. Behind the beautiful exterior lies the calendar’s true treasure: 24 mini jars of premium spreads, jams, and preserves. Each 1-ounce jar represents exceptional value at just $2.29 per pot when you consider the $54.99 total price. The inside has two dozen “charmingly designed” compartments, each containing a limited-edition Bonne Maman flavor, making every day leading up to Christmas a delicious discovery. This year’s flavor selection includes several exciting limited-edition varieties that showcase the brand’s commitment to innovation. Some of this year’s tasty limited-edition flavors include Strawberry with Passion Fruit Spread, Mango and Ginger Spread, Caramel Spread with Coffee, and Pear and Mandarin with Cinnamon Spread. Just reading these out loud makes me crave them already. These unique combinations demonstrate the brand’s ability to blend traditional French preserve-making with contemporary flavor profiles. Quality remains paramount in the 2025 edition, with all spreads made without high-fructose corn syrup, artificial colors, or preservatives. This commitment to natural ingredients aligns with growing consumer preferences for clean, wholesome products during the holiday season. Unlike typical holiday countdowns, this advent calendar actually has dual functionality. The packaging serves as both an attractive seasonal decoration and a practical gift that keeps giving long after the holidays. Once the jams are finished, the person you gave the calendar to can repurpose the little glass jars for everything from crafting supply storage to liquid travel containers. Given the calendar’s track record of selling out annually, early purchase is essential. The combination of the stunning new Christmas tree design, exclusive flavor varieties, and the brand’s reputation for quality makes the 2025 Bonne Maman Advent Calendar a standout choice for anyone seeking a sophisticated and delicious way to celebrate the countdown to Christmas.
